name: Create Your Own Ninja - Dress Up Game Naruto Shippuden Edition
name_original: Create Your Own Ninja - Dress Up Game Naruto Shippuden Edition
description:
Love Ninja Naruto? Then This App is For You! Create and Design your own Ninja!!

Feeling Excited After Watching the Latest Naruto Shippuden? Can't stop thinking about Naruto or Sasuke? Get this App Now!

Choose from a huge selection of costumes, masks, and more and make your very own character!

-Hundreds of Ninja Combinations!
-Hours of Fun!
-Really Easy to Use!
-Fun for Kids and Adults!

Share your Ninja with Family and Friends through Facebook, Instagram or Email.

Start Create Your Own Ninja Today, Download Now!
